trans-unit.source: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.
trans-unit.target: 代表文法項目，指定參考的規則。

trans-unit.source: The SrgsRuleRef class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> element whose contents have already been defined.
trans-unit.target: 您想要重複使用時，會特別有用 SrgsRuleRef 類別<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>已定義其內容的項目。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly.
trans-unit.target: 重複使用現有的規則，您可以更快速地建立複雜的文法。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the constructors of the SrgsRuleRef class to reference an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object or a `rule` element if the following is true: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object is in the containing grammar and the value of its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中 SrgsRuleRef 類別的建構函式參考<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>物件或`rule`項目，如果下列條件為真:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>物件是處於包含文法，而值的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope><xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>或</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>其</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: - The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`.
trans-unit.target: -`rule`元素位於外部的文法，而其`scope`屬性是`public`。

trans-unit.source: - The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar.
trans-unit.target: -`rule`外部文法的值中的項目是其`scope`屬性是`private`，而它被宣告為`root rule`外部文法。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表`ruleref`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 中所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).
trans-unit.target: 如需 SRGS`ruleref`項目，以及透過 System.Speech，其支援詳細資料請參閱[ruleref 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class and specifies the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>類別，並指定要參考的規則。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立的規則參照<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>內包含的文法物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的規則參考`rule`項目在外部文法檔案中，使用任何下列建構函式:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: rule is .
trans-unit.target: ruleis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class and specifies the location of the external grammar file to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>類別，並指定要參考的外部文法檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立外部文法檔案的規則參考。

trans-unit.source: The URI may also include the identifier of a rule to reference, for example `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`.
trans-unit.target: URI 可能也會包含參考，例如，某規則的識別項`http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`。

trans-unit.source: If the `uri` parameter does not specify a rule identifier, the rule reference points to the root rule of the target grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果`uri`參數未指定規則識別項規則參考會指向目標文法的根規則。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的規則參考<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>內相同的文法物件，請使用任何下列建構函式:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含文法外部文法檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: uri is .
trans-unit.target: uriis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class, specifying the rule to reference and a string that contains a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>類別，指定此規則來參考包含語意索引鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立的規則參照<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>內包含的文法物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的規則參考`rule`項目在外部文法檔案中，使用任何下列建構函式:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 語意索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class, specifying the location of the external grammar file and the identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>類別，指定外部文法檔案的位置以及要參考之規則的識別項。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立的規則參照`rule`外部文法檔案中的項目。

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的規則參考<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>內相同的文法物件，請使用任何下列建構函式:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含文法外部文法檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考規則的識別碼。

trans-unit.target: uriis .

trans-unit.target: ruleis .

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的規則參考<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>內相同的文法物件，請使用任何下列建構函式:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 包含文法外部文法檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考規則的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 語意索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化參數<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.
trans-unit.target: 定義可以配合口語的輸入，此文法與相關的聽寫主題所定義的規則。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.
trans-unit.target: 定義規則，可以比對任何語音，直到下一個規則符合下, 一個語彙基元，或語音輸入結尾。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.
trans-unit.target: 表示語音輸入可以包含拼字外字母的文字，而該拼字外字母可以辨識為文字。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.
trans-unit.target: 定義的規則，自動比對任何音訊的輸入不存在。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得的初始化參數<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化參數<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets an alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 取得語意的字典中的別名字串。

trans-unit.source: An alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 語意字典別名字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for the rule that this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element references.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URI 規則這<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref>項目參考。

trans-unit.source: The location of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考規則的位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 定義要讀出的規則。

trans-unit.source: Inserting VOID into a sequence automatically makes that sequence unspeakable.
trans-unit.target: VOID 插入順序會自動使該序列有這把鑰匙。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
